name: King Rabbit
detailed_description:
King Rabbit is a puzzle-platformer sandbox. The objective is simple but the journey will challenge your mind. Find the gold key and unlock the cage trapping your rabbit friends.

The tutorial will introduce new mechanics in a natural and exploratory way. As you progress the difficulty will increase while you master the nuances of each item and how it interacts with the world. You might find your brain hurting. The relaxed nature of King Rabbit allows you to take as much time and as many lives as you need.


Play levels created by the community! If you enjoy a level show the builder some love and give them a tip :). King Rabbit is very community driven.


Feeling creative? Create your own levels and earn tips from the community with your published levels. We couldn't keep up with player demand for levels so we created the level builder, the possibilities are endless.


Watch other players play King Rabbit. Spectating experienced players is an entertaining way to learn the game.


We'll be adding in-depth statistics for your levels so you can track your performance. You'll also be able to watch replays of people playing your levels. This is a good way to see where your level might be too difficult or frustrating for the player.


Collect fun and expressive character skins randomly hidden in levels. You'll be able to show off your character when people spectate you and when people play your levels. Some characters will be rare and very difficult to find.


New items, skins, and level themes are on the way. These will be added slowly, thank you for your patience.


After several updates we will begin porting over to other platforms including console and mobile. You will be able to sync your progress on any device.


Hang out with the nice guys making this game (Brian and Austin) and the awesome King Rabbit community! https://discordapp.com/invite/PVezFVb

short_description: King Rabbit will improve your mind and charm your soul. Explore perilous and brain busting levels, rescue rabbit citizens, and find your kingdom's treasure. The gameplay includes a healthy mix of logic and action!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M380 2048 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

  • OS: High Sierra

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M380 2048 MB
